research_insight_text_link.research_insight_description: GeoPura, Ltd. is focused on advancing zero-emissions fuel technology through the development of a power generation system. This system includes a controller that manages the selective provision of power from a fuel cell and a battery to a power outlet, incorporating an inverter for operational efficiency. The integration of these components suggests a commitment to enhancing the reliability and sustainability of clean energy solutions.

overview_description.description: GeoPura currently provides hydrogen power to Balfour Beatty, HS2, National Grid and the BBC among other sustainability-driven customers, replacing traditional diesel generators with its Hydrogen Power Unit (HPU) technology.

properties.growth_insight_description: GeoPura created 400 new jobs after receiving a £56 million investment.

about_short_description.short_description: GeoPura is enabling the production, transport, and use of zero-emissions fuels with innovative and commercially viable technology.

product.name: GeoPura Hydrogen Power Unit (HPU)
product.description: A portable unit that provides 250kVA of three-phase, 400V electrical power with an integral 216kWh battery system, using hydrogen fuel cells to generate clean energy with only water as a by-product.

product.name: Green Hydrogen Production
product.description: The process of using renewable energy sources like solar or wind to produce hydrogen through water electrolysis, which can be stored and transported for later use.

product.name: Renewable Off-Grid Energy Generation
product.description: A system that uses renewable energy to create hydrogen, which is then transported and converted to electrical power at the point of use, ensuring a clean and carbon-free process.

product.name: EV Charging & Transport Solutions
product.description: Provision of large-scale, off-grid energy for electric vehicle charging and hydrogen refueling stations, using HPUs to deliver power where grid access is limited.

product.name: Zero Emissions Power for Construction
product.description: Using HPUs to replace diesel generators on construction sites, providing emissions-free power and the option for combined heat and power (CHP) and EV charging.

identifier.value: Zero Emissions Power for Film & TV Production

product.name: Zero Emissions Power for Film & TV Production
product.description: Providing off-grid, emissions-free power for film and TV production using HPUs, which can be transported to remote locations and support various on-site needs.
